front.title: External Media Gateway Control Protocol MIB XGCP-MIB

abstract.t: This memo defines an experimental portion of the ManagementInformation Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in theInternet community. In particular, this proposal specifies a newXGCP-MIB module in a manner that is compliant to the SNMP SMI.The set of its objects is consistent with the SNMP framework and otherexisting SNMP standards.
